content: this easy beret pattern uses quick puff stitches and airy yarn to create a lightweight stylish hat you ll be able to whip up this straightforward cap in an evening and wear it the next day pattern includes suggestions for customizing sizing so you can get the perfect fit this is fun project you ll have memorized after the first few rounds call it a beret tam or slouch hat but make one today this ad-free pdf is formatted for easy printing and mobile viewing the included photo tutorials are separate from the written pattern so you can choose to print them or conserve ink the crochet all day beret pattern originally appeared on make & do crew sizing/measurements - one size to fit most adults several notes within pattern to customize your perfect beret see additional details in overall pattern notes to determine sizing downloading - this listing is for the crochet all day beret crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns find more of our favorite crochet hats and beanie patterns here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/crochet-hat-patterns/
